descriptionHtml: [b]The Companions Torches are torches for those who are using dark mods and find it really hard to see in the dark like i did. As you know in skyrim its very hard to find torches so I made my own..... The Torches come in a few colors check out the screenshots to see the colors they come in... You have to be part of the companions to remove the stolen marks on the torches... the torches are in the Companion's guild by the steps.[/b]
author: Bob100
